name: Modules.Nfc
summary: A cross-platform Near-Field-Communication (NFC) module for iOS and Android. Download the latest release via Github.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Nfc.MifareTagTechnology except those marked not-creation or read-only.

constants.name: ACTION_NDEF_DISCOVERED
constants.summary: Intent to start an activity when a tag with NDEF payload is discovered.

constants.name: ACTION_TAG_DISCOVERED
constants.summary: Intent to start an activity when a tag is discovered.

constants.name: ACTION_TECH_DISCOVERED
constants.summary: Intent to start an activity when a tag is discovered and activities are registered for the specific technologies on the tag.

constants.name: COMMAND_CONFIGURATION_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETERS
constants.summary: The tag has been configured with invalid parameters.

constants.name: ENCODING_UTF16
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
Indicates UTF-16 text encoding.

constants.name: ENCODING_UTF8
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
Indicates UTF-8 text encoding.

constants.name: ERROR_SECURITY_VIOLATION
constants.summary: A security violation associated with the reader session has occurred.

constants.name: ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_FEATURE
constants.summary: The reader session does not support this feature.

constants.name: INVALIDATION_ERROR_FIRST_NDEF_TAG_READ
constants.summary: The first NDEF tag read by this session is invalid.

constants.name: INVALIDATION_ERROR_SESSION_TERMINATED_UNEXPECTEDLY
constants.summary: The reader session terminated unexpectedly.

constants.name: INVALIDATION_ERROR_SESSION_TIMEOUT
constants.summary: The reader session timed out.

constants.name: INVALIDATION_ERROR_SYSTEM_IS_BUSY
constants.summary: The reader session failed because the system is busy.

constants.name: INVALIDATION_ERROR_USER_CANCELED
constants.summary: The user canceled the reader session.

constants.name: MIFARE_BLOCK_SIZE
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC tag technology. Size of a MIFARE CLassic block (in bytes).

constants.name: MIFARE_SIZE_1K
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC tag technology. Tag contains 16 sectors, each with 4 blocks.

constants.name: MIFARE_SIZE_2K
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC tag technology. Tag contains 32 sectors, each with 4 blocks.

constants.name: MIFARE_SIZE_4K
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC tag technology. Tag contains 40 sectors.

constants.name: MIFARE_SIZE_MINI
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC tag technology. Tag contains 5 sectors, each with 4 blocks.

constants.name: MIFARE_TAG_TYPE_CLASSIC
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC tag technology. A MIFARE Classic tag.

constants.name: MIFARE_TAG_TYPE_PLUS
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC tag technology. A MIFARE Plus tag.

constants.name: MIFARE_TAG_TYPE_PRO
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC tag technology. A MIFARE Pro tag.

constants.name: MIFARE_TAG_TYPE_UNKNOWN
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC tag technology. A MIFARE Classic compatible card of unknown type.

constants.name: MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT_PAGE_SIZE
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT tag technology. Size of a MIFARE Ultralight page (in bytes).

constants.name: MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT_TYPE_ULTRALIGHT
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT tag technology. A MIFARE Ultralight tag.

constants.name: MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT_TYPE_ULTRALIGHT_C
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT tag technology. A MIFARE Ultralight C tag.

constants.name: MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT_TYPE_UNKNOWN
constants.summary: Used with TECH_MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT tag technology. A MIFARE Ultralight compatible tag of unknown type.

constants.name: RECOMMENDED_ACTION_DO_ACTION
constants.summary: Used with NdefSmartPoster records (RTD_SMART_POSTER).

constants.name: RECOMMENDED_ACTION_OPEN_FOR_EDITING
constants.summary: Used with NdefSmartPoster records (RTD_SMART_POSTER).

constants.name: RECOMMENDED_ACTION_SAVE_FOR_LATER
constants.summary: Used with NdefSmartPoster records (RTD_SMART_POSTER).

constants.name: RECOMMENDED_ACTION_UNKNOWN
constants.summary: Used with NdefSmartPoster records (RTD_SMART_POSTER).

constants.name: RTD_ALTERNATIVE_CARRIER
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
RTD Alternative Carrier type. For use with TNF_WELL_KNOWN.

constants.name: RTD_HANDOVER_CARRIER
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
RTD Handover Carrier type. For use with TNF_WELL_KNOWN.

constants.name: RTD_HANDOVER_REQUEST
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
RTD Handover Request type. For use with TNF_WELL_KNOWN.

constants.name: RTD_HANDOVER_SELECT
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
RTD Handover Select type. For use with TNF_WELL_KNOWN.

constants.name: RTD_SMART_POSTER
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
RTD Smart Poster type. For use with TNF_WELL_KNOWN.

constants.name: RTD_TEXT
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
RTD Text type. For use with TNF_WELL_KNOWN.

constants.name: RTD_URI
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
RTD URI type. For use with TNF_WELL_KNOWN.

constants.name: TAG_TYPE_MIFARE_CLASSIC
constants.summary: Used with TECH_NDEF tag technology. NDEF on MIFARE Classic.

constants.name: TAG_TYPE_NFC_FORUM_TYPE_1
constants.summary: Used with TECH_NDEF tag technology. NFC Forum Tag Type 1.

constants.name: TAG_TYPE_NFC_FORUM_TYPE_2
constants.summary: Used with TECH_NDEF tag technology. NFC Forum Tag Type 2.

constants.name: TAG_TYPE_NFC_FORUM_TYPE_3
constants.summary: Used with TECH_NDEF tag technology. NFC Forum Tag Type 3.

constants.name: TAG_TYPE_NFC_FORUM_TYPE_4
constants.summary: Used with TECH_NDEF tag technology. NFC Forum Tag Type 4.

constants.name: TECH_ISODEP
constants.summary: Available tag technology used with getTechList and AdapterProxy.

constants.name: TECH_MIFARE_CLASSIC
constants.summary: Available tag technology used with getTechList and AdapterProxy.

constants.name: TECH_MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT
constants.summary: Available tag technology used with getTechList and AdapterProxy.

constants.name: TECH_NDEF
constants.summary: Available tag technology used with getTechList and AdapterProxy.

constants.name: TECH_NDEFFORMATABLE
constants.summary: Available tag technology used with getTechList and AdapterProxy.

constants.name: TECH_NFCA
constants.summary: Available tag technology used with getTechList and AdapterProxy.

constants.name: TECH_NFCB
constants.summary: Available tag technology used with getTechList and AdapterProxy.

constants.name: TECH_NFCF
constants.summary: Available tag technology used with getTechList and AdapterProxy.

constants.name: TECH_NFCV
constants.summary: Available tag technology used with getTechList and AdapterProxy.

constants.name: TNF_ABSOLUTE_URI
constants.summary: Used with ndefRecord records. Indicates the type field contains an absolute-URI BNF construct defined by RFC 3986.

constants.name: TNF_EMPTY
constants.summary: Used with ndefRecord records. Indicates the record is empty.

constants.name: TNF_EXTERNAL_TYPE
constants.summary: Used with ndefRecord records. Indicates the type field contains an external type name.

constants.name: TNF_MIME_MEDIA
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
Indicates the type field contains a media-type BNF construct, defined by RFC 2046.

constants.name: TNF_UNCHANGED
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
Indicates the payload is an intermediate or final chunk of a chunked NDEF Record.

constants.name: TNF_UNKNOWN
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
Indicates the payload type is unknown.

constants.name: TNF_WELL_KNOWN
constants.summary:
Used with ndefRecord records.
Indicates the type field contains a well-known RTD type name.

constants.name: TRANSCEIVE_ERROR_RETRY_EXCEEDED
constants.summary: Too many retries have occurred.

constants.name: TRANSCEIVE_ERROR_TAG_CONNECTION_LOST
constants.summary: Connection to the tag has been lost.

constants.name: TRANSCEIVE_ERROR_TAG_RESPONSE_ERROR
constants.summary: The tag has responded with an error.
